resources.string: You are in control of a flashing cursor. Single tapping the screen colors the grid cell where the cursor is located. Double tapping moves the cursor to the middle of the grid, as you move around in the real-world the cursor follows you. Swiping up quickly will undo your last change. Swiping down quickly will redo your last change. The menu contains functionality for saving to the image gallery, selecting the drawing color, clearing the drawing, changing the grid size, and adjusting the sensitivity of the cursor tracking.
